## Query.findByIdAndUpdate() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Updates the document with the id and returns the updated document. if the document is not present `undefined` will be returned

**Signature:**

```typescript
findByIdAndUpdate(id: IDBValidKey, payload: (param: DocumentType) => DocumentType, options?: QueryFindByIdAndUpdateOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

IDBValidKey


</td><td>

Valid search key to find a document


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

payload


</td><td>

(param: DocumentType) =&gt; DocumentType


</td><td>

Callback to update the found document


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[QueryFindByIdAndUpdateOptions](./iodm-query.queryfindbyidandupdateoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const updatedDoc = await query.findByIdAndUpdate(
 id,
 (oldDoc) => newDoc,
 options
);
```
